summary: A woman is released from prison and heads home to help outwit a local mob boss and pull off the scam of a lifetime.
cast: Robert Patrick|Jennifer Esposito|Mike Starr|Melissa Joan Hart|Mike Hagerty|Michael J. Pollard|Colm Meaney|Vyto Ruginis|Kyle T. Heffner|Robert Deacon|Brian Abercrombie|Val Lauren|Kenneth Moskow|David Jean Thomas|Brenda Nowatka|Rich 'The Body' Wiley|Bill Davis|Larry Tuff|Maurice Chevalier|Dan Underwood|Philip J. Jones|Brian Q. Kelley|Priscilla Padilla|Brian Penikas
director: Director: Philip J. Jones (as Phil Jones)
title: Backflash
